title: Changing Bad Money Habits
itunes:author: Guests: Chuck and Ann Bentley
itunes:summary:
What do you do when it feels like you and your spouse can't agree about money? John and Erin will share how to be patient when you and your mate are struggling to find financial unity. Featuring Chuck and Ann Bentley.


Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.


Get Chuck and Ann Bentley's book "Money Problems, Marriage Solutions" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-11-30?refcd=1181701


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/changing-bad-money-habits/#featured-resource-cta


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
